February 3, 2025 - Your Amazon Brand Health is made up of the following metrics: price competitiveness, Prime eligibility, and in-stock rate.

t: Understanding Amazon's 'Brand Health' Initiative - Practical Ecommerce
s: October 28, 2022 - Amazon's new A10 search algorithm ranks organic results, in part, on the "health" of a brand. In this post, I'll address the Amazon Brand Health initiative, its key metrics, and its effects on marketplace sellers.

Account Health. In Seller Central, click on the Brands tab, where you will find the Brand Dashboard. In this tab, Amazon shows sellers three main indicators: In-stock Rate, Prime Eligibility, Price Competitiveness.

t: How Did I Lose the Amazon Buy Box? - Blue Wheel
s: April 23, 2021 - If you are selling on Amazon you may have noticed the new “Urgent Brand Health” alert that has popped up when you log into Amazon Seller Central (see below). If you’re curious like us, you might be wondering what this new widget does and if you should be paying attention to it.

t: Optimize Your Brand Health With Amazon’s New Brand Dashboard - Feedvisor
s: November 22, 2023 - With the introduction of its Brand Dashboard in Seller Central, Amazon is equipping brands with SKU-level recommendations to improve overall brand health.
Health Concerns Cold Away - Immune Support & Defense - Vitamin Supplement for Cold & Flu Relief - Immunity System Booster - Licorice Root, Dong Quai, Chinese Skullcap & Andrographis - 90 Capsules

Thanks for reaching out with your concerns. The Brand Health Widget is designed to indicate when your branded products are out of stock, don’t have competitive prices, or have in-stock issues. It’s not a reflection of your account status.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Log in to your Brand Registry account and select Contact us from your homepage, then select Report a marketplace policy violation. Amazon also provides a publicly available form for reporting alleged intellectual property infringements such as copyright, trademark, and patent concerns...

t: r/FulfillmentByAmazon - Price Related "Brand Health Issue" for my product that is cheaper off Amazon — is it a problem?
Brand Health Alerts - General Selling Questions - Amazon Seller Forums
s: September 16, 2015 - Is anyone else getting brand health alerts for their items requiring the price to be lowered? It states that another retailer is selling this item at a lower price and we must lower the price to remain competitive and eligible to be listed on the product detail page.

t: Amazon releases blueprint to improve product safety
s: February 14, 2024 - Amazon strives to be Earth’s most customer-centric company, which includes ensuring that every product available for sale is safe.

t: The A10 algorithm: how to look after your brand health on Amazon | The Drum
s: May 27, 2022 - Amazon continues to target brands by enabling them to deliver an improved brand experience via the marketplace. Dean Hawes, head of account management at Optimizon, tells us that, once your brand is present on Amazon, it’s important to look after your brand health.
